page.title: 12BALLATER GOLF CLUB
page.content:
This is a fine 18 hole course set beside the River Dee. The club was first formed in 1892. It serves as an important tourist amenity from May to September. There is a local membership of 713 but relies heavily on visiting players and parties from home and abroad.
National tournaments are often hosted at Ballater and the club runs its own annual package holiday for golfing enthusiasts. Many of these visitors come from south of the border. This course with the surrounding hills and mountains is one of the most scenic golf courses in Scotland.
